titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the herb called Perigua, imported from the Indies shewing its admirable virtues in curing the diabetes. Written by a Dr. of Physick in the countrey to Dr. Burwell, President of the Colledge of Physitians at London.
titleStmt.author: Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A Dr. of Physick in the countrey = John Peachi; also sometimes attributed to John Pechey.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
